item.title: first
item.description:
Welcome

This post opens my new shiny blog, where I write notes about creative technological fun on my experiments with electronics, 3d printinting and computer programming. Hope you enjoy it.

item.title: about
item.description:
I am a computer software engineer, living in Italy, that enjoys hacking on electronics, mechanics, 3d printing, programming microcontrollers and computers in variuous languages.

I try to reserve a few hours on the weekend or an evening every week, for working on personal projects and try new stuff.

This way I can stay up to date with technology and learn new things.

The articles in this blog, document the interesting thing I discovere during my hackings.

Happy reading!
